Key Match Events: Michael Harris II made a jaw-dropping catch to rob Austin Hays of a home run
Others: The catch was viewed as one of the best catches ever seen in the game
The Braves further damaged their division title hopes with a 3-0 loss to the Phillies
Starting pitchers have allowed three runs or fewer in 20 straight games for the Braves
Others (continued): The catch extended the Braves' longest single-season streak since the mound was moved to its current distance in 1893
